events.title: Grease, Grit & Grime
events.description: We are excited to welcome back a former mainstay to the Crazy Horse stage for a free early gig. Grease, Grit and Grime has been a longtime, local institution for anyone who loves the blues. They like to call it “Dirty Blues” but it goes down smooth like a mint julep on a sunny afternoon. When it comes to the sultry, dance-inducing side of the blues equation, you can be sure they have that covered. Harp maestro Scott Hickman leads the charge.
events.venue_address: Crazy Horse Saloon & Grill, 230 Commercial Street, Nevada City, NV, 95959, United States

events.title: Bella Rayne Band
events.description: GET YOUR TICKETS NOW! Bella Rayne is an 18-year-old, self-taught guitar phenom from Mendocino who is on a rocket to the moon as her infectious presence has become ubiquitous on high-profile stages throughout the western hemisphere. It’s one thing to have talent at a young age. Bella has the casual swagger of an old soul on this planet doing what she’s meant to do. Her love for the Grateful Dead, 70s psychedelic rock and 90s grunge has been distilled into her own fresh approach, showing how it pa
events.venue_address: Crazy Horse Saloon & Grill, 230 Commercial Street, Nevada City, NV, 95959, United States

events.title: Red Dirt Ruckus
events.description: GET YOUR TICKETS NOW! Remember the good old days when Red Dirt Ruckus marched down the street, playing their instruments and leading a brigade of people through the front door of the Crazy Horse? That spirit still lives and is about to be reignited! Most can agree that it’s love at first sight with this band. Prepare for the kind of alchemy that occurs when you plant some Sierra Foothills jamgrass on New Orleans’ Frenchmen Street and then smoke it at a Celtic festival. Their captivating, euphori
events.venue_address: Crazy Horse Saloon & Grill, 230 Commercial Street, Nevada City, NV, 95959, United States

events.title: Willy Tea Taylor and The Sam Chase
events.description: GET YOUR TICKETS Dynamic Pairing Alert! Prepare for a cosmic convergence of two of the finest blues/soul/folk singer/songwriters to grace the Crazy Horse stage. This will be a Sunday night never to forget! “Willy Tea Taylor’s music is about healing. It’s about refusing to pass judgment, and willing to give forgiveness and understanding to all. It’s medicine as music.” – Saving Country Music “We can positively certify, that Willy Tea Taylor is a bonafide national treasure.” – Glide Magazine “Tayl
events.venue_address: Crazy Horse Saloon & Grill, 230 Commercial Street, Nevada City, NV, 95959, United States

events.title: Trivia Night
events.description: Nevada City’s longest running Trivia Night happens on *most* Wednesdays at the Crazy Horse. Great minds unite to Eat! Drink! Think! Bring your most clever friends, establish a team of up to five people and catalyze the collective power of your brilliant intellect. Your charismatic host BK will present questions covering a wide range of subjects in eight different categories. You’ll tap into knowledge you didn’t even realize you had. It’s challenging, it’s fun and it’s a refreshing change from th
events.venue_address: Crazy Horse Saloon & Grill, 230 Commercial Street, Nevada City, NV, 95959, United States

events.title: BrokenBass
events.description: Bass °°° Breaks °°° UK Garage °°° Electro Join us for a night of Multi-Genre Bass Forward Electronic Dance Music brought to you by Bartek Industries, co-curator of Evolv3 Drum and Bass. Expect deep body bass with funky grooves to make you move. events.venue_address: Crazy Horse Saloon & Grill, 230 Commercial Street, Nevada City, NV, 95959, United States

events.title: Las Nina Muertas
events.description: Tucked away in the Sierra Foothills of Northern California, a band of renegade women honor the music of the Grateful Dead all the way to its roots. Las Ninas Muertas is a five-piece, mostly acoustic unit playing a wide range of material from the Dead catalog as well as some of their well-loved covers. Ingrained with a passion for this timeless songbook, Las Ninas Muertas sing in that high-lonesome, four-part harmony style. Searing harmonica slices through the mix along with electric guitar riffs
events.venue_address: Crazy Horse Saloon & Grill, 230 Commercial Street, Nevada City, NV, 95959, United States

events.title: Desperate Electric
events.description: GET YOUR TICKETS NOW! Emerging from the mountains of Montana, Desperate Electric invites you to a universe where Marvin Gaye meets Daft Punk for cocktails. Seamlessly fusing the worlds of organic and electronic, their music is an unbridled expression of desire. Dubbed “Montana’s Hottest Power Disco Duo,” Desperate Electric brings the baby makers and the booty shakers to the party.
